title: A new and refreshing hotel in Mysuru
text:
I got a good deal while booking online at this hotel but after going through the reviews, I was little skeptical about my stay here.
Nonetheless I chose this hotel because of its rooms, wi-fi service and complimentary breakfast and I am happy to say it was a good decision.
As the hotel is newly built, the restaurant isn't ready yet so you only get the complimentary breakfast as of now between 8 - 9.30 am in morning at the second floor. 

The room was lovely, fitted with all amenities, neat and clean and the wi-fi service was very good. The check-in and check out process was smooth desk staff was courteous.

On second day of my stay when I returned in afternoon the room was not cleaned up yet and when I raised this issue, the staff immediately attended to it and cleaned up everything in couple of minutes.

So overall a comfortable stay, good location (on the main road so easy to locate), and value for the money. Would surely give a try once more when I visit next.

P.S. The ayurvedic spa has some good deals though I missed trying it out.

title: New and cool
text:
Hotel Golden Castle is a part of Treebo group. I booked the room online via Treebo website and the user sign-up had a discount !!. No advance was paid and the booking was seamless. I got Treebo booking conformation message and subsequent messages regarding 'how to reach' and google location. Cool stuff !!

Location of the hotel is great. It is hardly a kilometer from Mysore Junction railway station and all the major hot spots are pretty near. The property is new and well maintained. The check-in process was standard. Rooms were clean and tidy. Wifi was decent. 

There is no in-house restaurant and the buffet breakfast lacked a proper dining space, which I feel is a big miss. The inclusive buffet breakfast was decent with limited options. 

Service of the staff was not up-to industrial standards. There are plenty of budget restaurants around the hotel to choose for meal options.

Hotel has an ayurvedic massage center. No comments on it. Overall I feel that Golden Castle is a decent hotel for the rate and its location is attractive.

title: Brand New Property
text: Stayed at Golden Castle during mid Dec 2015 with family. Brand New Hotel with good location, high quality rooms, experienced and friendly staff. The place was very clean and service was good. The only negative point was the breakfast, as no choice of food. The Hotel does not have a restaurant as such, and food is served and left in a small room in the 2nd Floor for the Guests to help themselves. The choice was only Idli with Sambar and Chutney and Bread with Butter N Jam.Other than this drawback will recommend Golden Castle and also will look for other Treebo managed properties in other locations when travelling.

title: awesome room! but that is about it
text:
The hotel just open 2 months before i staid there. So the room was clean and the bathroom modern and spotless! Hot water with good pressure 24h.
Bed is big and confortable and room are large. I was able to do my yoga practice in my room.
People at reception are nice and try to help out at their best.
Breakfast is provided, simple one in plastic chair but I believe the dining area is still under construction.

on the down side, 
- the hotel is very noisy. Adding some furniture or even plans in the corridor would help to absorb the noise.
- the sheets of my bed were dirty but after a quick call to reception they have been changed strait away
- some employee would just ring your door bell trying to sell you water while the hotel provide at least one free bottle of water a day.
- there is no good restaurant nearby. the one cross the road (which also provide the food for room service) is not really good and i got food poisoning from there.

title: Great standard for the price!
text:
Rooms are very spacious, modern, bright and clean! It was a pleasure to rest in that room after whole day of walks trough busy street of Mysore. 
Hotel still in the construction but I wasn't bothering at all. Halls seem to be a bit empty and also restaurant is not done, but the rooms and most important the price of stay really really compensate it fully. 
I think If you travel with a back pack and try to sleep in budget places that one is really like a cherry on the cake! Price almost like for budget hotel but comfort of stay way much higher!

title: Nice room - service is lacking
text:
I sometimes will give a hotel a 5 star review if it's staff go above and beyond but it's facilities are basic. For this hotel, it is the other way round. Facilities were good but staff were very underwhelming. It still gets 3/5 based on the price point. If it were any more expensive than what we paid (it appears that it will go up in price once the hotel is complete), I may have lowered my rating. 

The hotel is newish and parts of it are still under construction. The rooms itself are finished and are spacious and modern. Bed was comfortable. No complaints about the room aside from thin walls so noise is a bit of a problem. There is meant to be free wifi but in reality it worked about 15% of the time in the three nights we stayed. 

However, the staff is where this hotel needs to place its attention. First, rooms were not serviced and towels unchanged (beginning to understand that this is not uncommon in India). But, we stayed here for three nights and every time we needed toilet paper we had to go downstairs to ask reception (and we were given the tiniest rolls of toilet paper I have come across in India so far). We organised washing through the hotel (negotiate the first rate they give, they dropped the price from 65 rupees per item after we found a much cheaper service nearby). When our laundry was returned to us, the delivery man stood at our door and demanded that we pay right then for the service. We asked if we could settle the bill at checkout and he refused and stood there until we found cash to pay him. When we asked the hotel where we could buy bottled water (there wasn't an obvious store nearby) they said, no worries - we will send one up to you. Again, when the guy delivered it to us he demanded payment immediately at our door. The hotel staff talked at us, even though we apologised and said that we were unable to understand. They continued repeating what they were saying even though we thought it was clear that we didn't understand. Overall, it did not make for a pleasant experience. It's a shame because the hotel has so much potential. Hopefully, with a bit of staff training this hotel will be worthy of a 5 rating.
ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,

I appreciate the detailed feedback you have shared about staff interaction. I regret the inconvenience you had to go through during your stay. We have received similar feedback from some other guests as well, and have initiated a training for our staff at the hotel. I am sure that you experience next time will be much better !

Thanks again for taking out time to write detailed feedback. It really matters to us.  

I hope you will give us further opportunities to serve you better. 

Best Wishes,
Amit Kumar
Treebo Hotels

title: Nice room..but still in construction
text: I booked via booking.com and the price was pretty good. What i did't knew was that they still building this place. The staff was not really used to run a business yet. So i got woked up at 8 a.m via telephon just to reminded me to eat breakfast. It turns out that the room where the "buffet" was is still under construction and there where nothing then a few plastic chairs to sit on. The room was really clean but not fully finished yet, the wifi was less then average but the tv with more then enough canals (also in english) was nice.
